message.body: Do you wanna buy the tickets and then I'll pay you back for mine? I hate touching the cafeteria
Oh dont worry about it, i got it :)

Are you sure? Also I do really want to get coffee but you keep catching me at inopportune times...I have a lot of homework/chores to do and I have to finish Andrew's birthday present...can we do something in the next couple of days instead?
